sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The DHCP package contains dhclient, dhcpd and dhcrelay.

sect3.title: dhclient
sect3.para: dhclient is the implementation of the DHCP client.

sect3.title: dhcpd
sect3.para: dhcpd implements Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) and Internet Bootstrap Protocol (BOOTP) requests for network addresses.

sect3.title: dhcrelay
sect3.para: dhcrelay provides a means to accept DHCP and BOOTP requests on a subnet without a DHCP server and relay them to a DHCP server on another subnet.
